com.isbx.androidtools.ui.dialogs

Class TextInputDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Dialog
      • android.app.AlertDialog
        • com.isbx.androidtools.ui.dialogs.TextInputDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DialogInterface, KeyEvent.Callback, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback

    public class TextInputDialog
extends AlertDialog
    A subclass of AlertDialog that contains and editable text field as its view and up to three buttons.

    • Nested Class Summary
